name: Lone Wolf Reckoning
description:
Your wolf has been taken by the military and your goal is to find and rescue him. I know, sounds like a cheesy John Wick ripoff and that's because well...it is. 

This game is in no standards good and if I was you I would probably turn back now - or go to sleep because at this point you are probably in the darkest recesses of itch.io - nevertheless its pretty fun and i had a blast making it. Thanks for visiting and hope you enjoy the game.

Note: better weapons are unlocked as you progress - use scroll wheel/'triangle'.

p.s. Is it just me or is Six Fingered Sarge looking kinda THICCC.
